short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: DM Screen Extension for D&D Beyond. This extension extends the campaign page to turn it into a DM screen.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension extends the D&D Beyond's campaign page to turn it into a DM screen.

In the campaign page of D&D Beyond and it will add for each characters their stats such as:
- AC
- HP
- Initiative bonus
- Saving throws
- Passive checks
